subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Brian Schottenheimer, the Jets' first-year offensive coordinator, is unmistakably his mother's son but is more closely identified with his father, Marty, a longtime N.F.L. coach.
snippet: Brian Schottenheimer, the Jets' first-year offensive coordinator, is unmistakably his mother's son but is more closely identified with his father, Marty, a longtime N.F.L. coach.
